name: The Last Train
storyline:
Your sister has recently gone missing at the nearby metro station. After several more reports of weird occurrences, it is agreed to abandon and close the platform. From hearing the news of losing your sister, every night you have been searching the platform for any clues on her disappearance.

After spending nights at the platform, you start undergoing strange hallucinations and non-stop nightmares, all involving a strange figure. The last nightmare you remember takes you to The Last Train crashed onto the platform, with one door open and the light on. With no escape or exit you decide to try board the train.

After your final nightmare, you wake up in a room that is not your own. Can you solve the mystery of your sister and escape The Conductor?
